ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a suitability meeting date/time is recorded.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && ( (ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, "Await decision" ) || ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, "In fulfilment" ) || ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, "Complete" )) && ISBLANK( Suitability_meeting_date_time__c ) && NOT( RecordType.DeveloperName = "RegularAmendment") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please record the advice meeting details or mark this as being non-presented.
